definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
by fair means or foul/by hook or by crook/unscrupulously

sentences.english: Perhaps he earned the money through ill means.
sentences.chinese: 或许他的钱是通过卑劣的手段挣来的。

sentences.english: The CrossCorrelation is an essential means of getting disturbing industrial frequency.
sentences.chinese: 互相关函数是确定工频干扰噪声频率的一个重要手段。

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生产手段齐全能量大，生产能力每月可达800吨。

sentences.english: The financial supervision is an important means for guaranteeing the orderly implementation of the financial activities.
sentences.chinese: 财务监督是保证财务活动有序进行的重要手段。

sentences.english: There's no difference between a cancer vaccine and any other cancer therapy.
sentences.chinese: 癌症疫苗和其他任何癌症治疗手段之间并无差别。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 随着检测手段的进步，转分化正逐渐被人们认同。

sentences.english: Positional clone is an important method for discovering novel genes.
sentences.chinese: 图位克隆是发现新基因的重要手段。

sentences.english: Operation was the most effective therapy for jaw hemangiomas.
sentences.chinese: 对颌骨血管瘤手术治疗是最有效的手段。

sentences.english: He uses some dubious shifts to get money.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些可疑的手段去赚钱。

sentences.english: Yes, the messages were obtained illegally.
sentences.chinese: 是的，这些信息是通过非法手段获取的。

sentences.english: And joint state-private ownership was one way led to the goal.
sentences.chinese: “公私合营”即是达成这个任务的一种手段。

sentences.english: One of the more sinister-sounding behaviours of China's angry youth online is the 'human flesh search engine'.
sentences.chinese: “人肉搜索”是中国愤青们比较恶毒的手段之一。

sentences.english: Don't play a shabby trick on me.
sentences.chinese: 不要对我耍卑劣的手段。

sentences.english: It is difficult to achieve the precision measurement of the position of the micro holes with traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 微小孔系的精密测量用传统的手段是难以实现的。

sentences.english: This was done by a number of means , including chipping at the buildings with pickaxes .
sentences.chinese: 这是做了一些手段，包括插话在建筑物与镐。

definition: move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to draw support from/with the help of
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
